    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs=""
>
[Edgewatch Detective Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2193) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Edgewatch Detective](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=85)

**Prerequisites**
Intelligence 14 or Wisdom 14

</column>

---

You become trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) or [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17); if you are already trained in both of these skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can use Perception instead of [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) to [Track](/Actions.aspx?ID=66), and you gain the [Experienced Tracker](/Feats.aspx?ID=780) skill feat.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from this archetype.

<title level="2">Edgewatch Detective Dedication leads to...</title>
[Arcane Sensitivity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2195), [Bolera's Interrogation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2196), [Sense Alignment](/Feats.aspx?ID=2194)
name: Edgewatch Detective Dedication
